metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1493 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the min_get_slash_argument function inlib/configonlylib.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.8, 2.7.xbefore 2.7.5, and 2.8.x before 2.8.3 allows remote authenticated users toread arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the file parameter, asdemonstrated by reading PHP scripts.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
